participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, Maya enjoys exploring her artistic side through music and literature.
participant_1.background: I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things. I enjoy getting my nails done as a way to relax and pamper myself. I drive a car that is both reliable and fuel-efficient, so I can get to my business and music lessons on time. I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. my parents are still married.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Jake loves socializing and trying new experiences.
participant_2.background: I have a cat who was a stray that we adopted. I like to go out to the bars. I'm really into making sure my nails always look their best! I am a financial analyst for a brewery. I enjoy wearing comfortable, stylish clothing that is made from sustainable materials.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Hey, I'm good. Just got home from a long day at work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
I'm a financial analyst for a brewery.
That sounds fun! I love beer.
Me too! I get to drink a lot of it for free.
Lucky! I wish I could drink for free.
It's not always as great as it sounds. I have to drink a lot of different beers, and sometimes they're not very good.
Oh, I guess that could be a downside.
Yeah, but it's still a pretty sweet gig.
I'm sure it is.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, go out to the bars, and play video games.
I like to do those things too! I also like to go to concerts and play music.
Oh, cool! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing.
That's awesome! I play drums.
Nice! We should jam sometime.
That would be fun!
Cool, let's exchange numbers.
